document.full_text: wealthy asian buyers are used to jostling for seats at fashion house prada's catwalk shows, but investors may baulk at the price of its upcoming $2 billion initial public share offering in hong kong.
document.title: investors stay wary before prada's ipo show
lines_and_colors: wealthy asian buyers are used to jostling for seats at fashion house prada's catwalk shows, but investors may baulk at the price of its upcoming $2 billion initial public share offering in hong kong.
